title: [1.7.10]Ultra Compression超级压缩----更好的储存你的块！
author: ccxz
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ccxz 于 2014-8-31 00:13 编辑 
实际上这是个十分神奇的mods，它彻底改变了原版矿物块（钻石块之类的）的无用机制，变得比较有用
实际就是可以让钻石块再压缩再压缩，可以压缩2,4,6,8,10倍，不止是钻石，原石泥土之类的也可以压缩哦·······
原文介绍
Hi! my name is SamRaven2, and this is my first publicly released mod for Minecraft!

I found that I have the tendency to never want to throw my resources away, but always start to run out of places to put them. Taking inspiration form Extra Utilities, I decided to create extremely compressed versions of a lot more things in the game, most notably being redstone. This mod will add up to 8 levels of compression to whatever blocks I have added to it.

Maybe in the future, once I get more experience, I will give the user the ability to add items to compress. In the meantime, since the mod is open source, people with the knowledge can maybe add them themselves!

Anyways, I hope you enjoy the mod!
再来看看合成

没错····就是这样，还可以以此类推一直压压压·······压死你为止

反过来可以再分解

实际没什么作用
不过还是有用的
比如压缩的红石块可以让红石信号传的更加远
压缩的矿物块可以比普通的矿物块更增加信标等级之类的
不过主要是给土豪用的


下载地址：这
[groupid=760]某Z的水货联盟[/groupid]

replies.txt_content: 就这样，不断的压缩，节省了不少空间，但是你确保必须有9个才能进一个，多出来的还是会占一些空间呀，不过好过原来呵呵
